description: This file defines a React functional component 'Sidebar' used as a control panel for configuring chart options such as chart type, colors, axes, and legend toggling in a chart-building application.

methods.name: Sidebar({ chartType = 'bar', onChangeChartType = () => {}, onLoadSample = () => {}, colors = [], onChangeColor = () => {}, xKey = '', yKeys = [], availableColumns = [], onChangeXKey = () => {}, onToggleYKey = () => {}, showLegend = true, onToggleLegend = () => {}, })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar control panel with chart configuration options.
